original_text: By faith Moses, when he was born, was hidden for three months by his parents, because they saw that the child was beautiful, and they were not afraid of the king's edict.
korean_text: 믿음으로 모세가 났을 때에 그 부모가 아름다운 아이임을 보고 석 달 동안 숨겨 왕의 명령을 무서워하지 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: was hidden for three months by his parents
sentences.korean_translation: 그 부모에게 석 달 동안 숨겨졌습니다

sentences.original_text: because they saw that the child was beautiful
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 아이가 아름다운 것을 보았기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: and they were not afraid of the king's edict
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 왕의 명령을 두려워하지 않았습니다
